articles.title: Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Medal to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a medal marking the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War from Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation.
					 A ceremony took place in Pyongyang on Friday.
					
					 The medal and diploma were handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, upon authorization.

articles.title: Command of KPA in Southwestern Sector of Front Issues Emergency Special Warning
articles.content:
Command of KPA in Southwestern Sector of Front Issues Emergency Special Warning
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet military have recently reached the height in their provocative hysteria in the hotspot waters of the West Sea of Korea.
					 They committed military provocations by infiltrating a total of 17 speedboats of the puppet navy two-three times every day deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK from May 1 to 7. A total of five speedboats of the puppet navy intruded into the territorial waters of the DPRK several times from 06:30 to 13:50 on April 26.
					
					 The intrusions were made under the pretext of "intercepting fishing boats" of a third country but its ulterior purpose was to "defend the northern limit line", the illegal line.
					
					 Such reckless intrusions are escalating in the hotspot waters in the overall southwest sea including Paekryong, Taechong and Yonphyong Islands.
					
					 These naval intrusions timed to coincide with the leaflet scattering operations being conducted openly on the whole front are lashing the service personnel of the Korean People's Army in the southwestern sector of the front into a great fury.
					
					 In view of the prevailing situation, the command of the KPA in the southwestern sector of the front made public the following emergency special warning on Friday upon authorization:
					
					 1. From this moment, it will make a sighting strike without any prior warning at any warship of the south Korean puppet navy intruding into the extension of demarcation line in the hotspot of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 There is a limit to the patience of the KPA service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front.
					
					 The DPRK had already announced several times that self-defensive military strikes would be made at the provocateurs intruding into the territorial waters of the DPRK even 0. 001mm.
					
					 The KPA service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front do not make an empty talk.
					
					 2. In case the provocateurs challenge the self-defensive sighting strike of the KPA, it will successively deal strong second, third and more retaliatory strikes at them.
					
					 Its successive retaliatory strikes will prove what miserable end the provocateurs would meet.
					
					 This warning is based on the resolute decision to mercilessly punish with arms the provocateurs hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 In case the utmost patience exercised by the KPA service personnel in the southwestern sector of the front turn into resentment of justice and their repeated warnings lead to prompt actions, the south Korean puppet authorities will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences as they orchestrated and incited the provocations.

articles.title: National Aerospace Development Administration Clarifies Its Principled Stand
articles.content:
National Aerospace Development Administration Clarifies Its Principled Stand
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Space development represents an indomitable soul of Juche Korea, ardent desire for prosperity and an expression of inexhaustible strength to outpace the world.
					 The United States and the undesirable hostile forces led by it cursed for their injustice and ill nature are challenging the fair public opinion with their sheer sophism and far-fetched assertions.  
					
					 They claim that the construction of the satellite control centre in the DPRK is "part of the preparations to fire ballistic missiles soon", "provocation disturbing global peace and security" and "an act of escalating confrontation with the international community".
					
					 They have gone the lengths of letting loose of a litany of rubbish that "the capability to control satellite launching pad precisely means capability to control nuclear delivery means" and the DPRK is set to use it as "a card for negotiations with the U.S."
					
					 They are steeped in such inveterate repugnance, persecution mania and practice of making profound confusing of right and wrong that they shout hoarse that the above-said center is a facility to command long-range ballistic missile and "a camouflaged facility" for developing missiles and it is subject to new sanctions of the UN.
					
					 A spokesman for the National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK in a statement clarified the following principled stand: 
					
					 1. No one, be he or she, should no longer misinterpret the entirely just space development of the DPRK and float wild rumors about it.
					
					 It is an important project being undertaken by scientists, technicians and workers of the DPRK for dignity and self-esteem of the nation to break through the cutting edge in the field of space development.
					
					 If the U.S. and its allies, the undesirable forces, persistently vociferate about the center, refusing to face up to the reality, this will only sound like a dog's barking and the desperate bid they make, wasting time, will be little short of crazy efforts of rabid dogs.  
					
					 2. It is the invariable stand of the DPRK to continue launching satellites of Juche Korea for peaceful purposes in the designated place when necessary.
					
					 It is entirely an independent right of the DPRK to launch precious satellites manufactured by its own efforts and technology.
					
					 No matter who dares grumble and no matter how all hostile forces challenge the launch, satellites of Juche Korea will soar into the space one after another at the time and place designated and decided by the supreme leadership of the Korean revolution.
					
					 3. The high dignity of the DPRK as a satellite manufacturer and launcher will be exalted as the days go by, regardless of whether it is recognized or not.
					
					 Space development for peaceful purposes is a legitimate right of Songun Korea chosen by its party, army and people.
					
					 The dignified status of the DPRK as a satellite manufacturer and launcher will never change no matter how desperately the U.S. and other hostile forces may deny. Therefore, the space development for peaceful purposes being pushed forward by the DPRK according to its long-term goal and plan is not the one to be abandoned due to others' opposition.
					
					 The DPRK re-clarifies that its satellites will more dynamically soar into the space in succession, shattering the reckless moves of all the dishonest hostile forces in the indomitable spirit of the resourceful Korean nation.

articles.title: UNSC 1718 Committee's Step for Freezing DPRK Trading Cargo Ship Mudubong Slammed
articles.content:
UNSC 1718 Committee's Step for Freezing DPRK Trading Cargo Ship Mudubong Slammed
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The manager of the Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Friday in connection with the step taken for freezing its cargo ship Mudubong which has been interned for nearly ten months in Mexico for an unjustifiable reason:
					 On May 6 the 1718 Committee of the UN Security Council took a step for freezing Mudubong, a trading cargo ship of our company, by deliberately slapping sanctions against it, pursuant to the scenario of the U.S. and other hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 I vehemently denounce the step as a provocation of the hostile forces to lay a hurdle in our shipping business, a wanton breach of international law, undisguised disregard of domestic laws of the sovereign state and, furthermore, a grave encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 We had already made it clear that Mudubong is a property of the Mudubong Shipping Co. Ltd. of the DPRK, not the property of the Ocean Maritime Management Co. Ltd. which is allegedly on the list of the UN     "sanctions," and is not under its control.
					
					 Our company is a corporate body independent of the Ocean Maritime Management Co. Ltd. as it is a social cooperative organization established according to relevant laws of the DPRK. It has the absolute right to control and dispose of the ship as its legitimate owner.
					
					 However, the 1718 Committee decided to freeze Mudubong by groundlessly linking our company with the Ocean Maritime Management Co. Ltd., a separate corporate body, without any legal ground.
					
					 As Mudubong was stranded on coral reef off Tuxpan Port of Mexico in July, 2014, our company has already suffered not a few losses in management and our company and its crewmen came to suffer bigger economic losses due to the unilateral and discriminating step taken by the 1718 Committee.
					
					 Mudubong is a peaceable civilian trading ship which has neither violated international law nor handled any prohibited cargo. There is, therefore, neither reason nor ground for the 1718 Committee to make the ship subject to "sanctions." 
					
					 A civilian trading ship deserves protection even in wartime according to international law. It is an unreasonable attitude which cannot convince anyone and human rights abuse wantonly encroaching upon the vital rights of crewmen that the 1718 Committee made a civilian ship subject to "sanctions" and freezing of property in a peace time.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that the 1718 Committee's recent decision will bring huge economic losses and burdens not only to our company but to Mexico.
					
					 Believing that the unreasonable step of the 1718 Committee will be denounced by the world shipping circle and crewmen as it is a prejudiced tyrannical act of wantonly ignoring the regular international shipping usage, I officially request the Mexican authorities to render positive cooperation to Mudubong from a fair stand on the principle of humanitarianism so that it may safely leave the port together with its crewmen.

articles.title: DPRK-Thailand Joint Stamps Issued
articles.content:
DPRK-Thailand Joint Stamps Issued
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Kingdom of Thailand jointly brought out stamps in commemoration of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries.
					 Printed on the upper part of the stamps are letters reading "40th Anniversary of DPR Korea-Thailand Diplomatic Relations" in Korean and English.
					
					 The stamps feature Accipiter gentilis and Lophura diardi, national birds of the two countries.
					
					 The DPRK and Thailand established the diplomatic relations at ambassadorial level on May 8, Juche 64 (1975).
					
					 The joint issue of the stamps will contribute to developing the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves for Russia
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and his party left Pyongyang by special plane on Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the victory in the Great Patriotic War to be held in Moscow.
					 He was seen off by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier, Ri Kil Song vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly; Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier of the Cabinet; Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture; and officials concerned and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Russian embassy and Russian guests staying in the DPRK.
					
					 The ambassador in a speech said that in the past Patriotic War the Soviet army and people beat back the invasion by fascist Germany and won a great victory by giving play to popular heroism and ardent popular patriotism.
					
					 He noted that Comrade Kim Il Sung, the leader of the guerrillas of Korea, called for defending the Soviet Union with arms and the guerrillas waged a positive struggle to carry out his order.
					
					 The Russian people value the friendship with the Korean people, he said, went on: Immutable is the line of the Russian leadership to develop multi-faceted cooperation with the DPRK with good tradition.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK cooperation is entirely in line with the interests of the peoples of the two countries, he said, expressing belief that it would contribute to keeping peace and stability in the region and settling the issue of the Korean peninsula through dialogue.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in a speech said that the brave sons and daughters of the Soviet Union turned out in the sacred drive for defense of the country and great war of justice seven decades ago, protecting the dignity of the country and global peace and security.
					
					 He noted that President Kim Il Sung put up a slogan calling for defending the Soviet Union with arms and fought a bloody anti-Japanese war to foil the attempt of the Japanese militarists to invade the Soviet Union in the East, thus giving historic origin to the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 The DPRK-Russia friendly relations are developing at a fresh higher level under the special care of the top leaders of the two countries, he said, adding that this year was proclaimed as a year of the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 We will closely cooperate with the Russian friends to consolidate the DPRK-Russia friendly relations and ensure the regional peace and security with joint efforts, he added.

articles.title: Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Mongolian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party led by Z. Batbayar, secretary in charge of external relations, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests went round historic relics, being briefed on the glorious revolutionary history of the President, who was born into thatch-roofed house and made unremitting efforts for the Korean revolution and the victorious advance for accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 They went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and Okryu Children's Hospital.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Slams Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Guidelines"
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Slams Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Guidelines"
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) in a statement on Friday accused the U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries of revising the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines" for aggression on April 27.
					 The revised "guidelines" is a document for a war of aggression the keynote of which allows the Japan "Self-Defence Forces" (SDF) to enter south Korea at their will and stage military operations not only in contingency on the Korean peninsula but also in peace time, ignoring the south Korean puppet regime, under the pretext of military cooperation with the U.S. forces, pursuant to the U.S. strategy for executing a war of aggression, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The revision laid a springboard from which the Japanese reactionaries can zealously join in a nuclear war against the DPRK anytime under the pretext of exercising the "right to collective self-defense" and dispatch its troops to anywhere in the world. 
					
					 Consequently, the Korean peninsula has been exposed to the danger of a nuclear war and regional peace and security faced a serious challenge.
					
					 The above-said revision is a natural product of the south Korean regime's disgraceful policy of sycophancy towards the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is hordes of traitors working hard to knock into shape the aggressive triangular military alliance, talking about "conclusion of agreement on intelligence sharing among south Korea, the U.S. and Japan" pursuant to the scenario of the Japanese reactionaries for militarist reinvasion, failing to utter even a word in protest against the crimes perpetrated by Japan against Koreans in the past.
					
					 The Park group has gone so servile to the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy, as to declare that it would resume the defense and finance ministerial talks with Japan pronto and hold with splendor an "event marking the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between south Korea and Japan" in a bid to "more closely cooperate" with Japan under the pretext of handling the past history separately from the security issue.
					
					 The Korean nation is bound to meet a disaster as long as this sycophantic and country-selling regime is allowed to stay to encourage the Japanese militarists in their ambition for reinvasion, far from pressurizing them to redress their past crimes. 
					
					 Such source of misfortune and trouble should be rooted out at the earliest possible date.

articles.title: Spokesman for GFTUK Central Committee Denounces S. Korean Puppet Group's Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
Spokesman for GFTUK Central Committee Denounces S. Korean Puppet Group's Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea Friday issued a statement denouncing the south Korean puppet group for its brutal crackdown upon workers' large-scale rallies and demonstrations.
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The puppet group of gangsters cruelly beat workers and arrested them, far from congratulating them on May Day, stunning the world people. 
					
					 The GFTUK Central Committee brands its fascist crackdown as heinous human rights abuses and unpardonable challenge to justice and democracy and vehemently denounces them on behalf of all workers in the northern half of Korea. 
					
					 The puppet regime has turned south Korea into a veritable hell and a tundra of human rights.  It is, therefore, the height of impudence for it to pull up the DPRK over its "human rights issue."
					
					 The recent May Day rallies were a clear manifestation of the pent-up grudge and resentment of the people from all walks of life including workers at the authorities' unbearable unpopular rule.
					
					 With neither high-handed actions nor suppression can the south Korean regime arrest the just struggles of the workers to have their vital rights guaranteed.
					
					 If the regime continues resorting to fascist crackdown upon the just actions of people from all walks of life, refusing to face up to the mind-set of the angry public and the trend of the times, it will surely meet its doom.
					
					 All workers in the northern half of Korea will positively support the workers and other people of south Korea in their just actions for democratic freedom and the right to existence against the unpopular policies and fascist rule of the regime.

articles.title: Role of DPRK Red Cross Society Increased
articles.content:
Role of DPRK Red Cross Society Increased
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Today marks World Day of Red Cross and Red Crescent.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Yu Ju Yong, deputy secretary of the C.C., the DPRK Red Cross Society.
					
					 Yu said:
					
					 In 2014, the DPRK Red Cross Society enhanced its role in disaster prevention, public medical service and water hygiene.
					
					 The society has paid big efforts to preventing disasters caused by climate change.
					
					 It newly established emergency programs and system in cooperation with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies.
					
					 It organized relief squads of volunteers in the areas easy to be hit by disasters and offered various courses and practical trainings to them.
					
					 It set up early warning and evacuation system in danger-stricken areas in line with the disaster risk reduction plan in community, while publishing books "Early Warning and Evacuation in Community" and "Volunteers' Manual for Emergency Relief".
					
					 Meanwhile, the society rendered technical and material assistance to the people, living in areas susceptible to floods and landslides, in cultivating saplings and planting trees.
					
					 It supplied various kinds of medicines and medical instruments to hospitals in North Phyongan, North Hwanghae and other provinces.
					
					 It also built and rebuilt water supply and drainage pipes in cooperation with the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and others.

articles.title: Medicinal Herb Cultivation Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Medicinal Herb Cultivation Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Medicinal herb cultivation is gaining momentum in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in April and May.
					 Public health organs in South Phyongan Province have turned out in a campaign to cultivate various species of medicinal herbs in spring. 
					
					 Meanwhile, medicament management offices in the province are purchasing in time a large amount of medicinal herbs gathered by residents.
					
					 The same is true for other provinces, including North Phyongan and Hwanghae provinces.

articles.title: New Technology for Abalone Farming Developed
articles.content:
New Technology for Abalone Farming Developed
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Global Environment Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK developed a new technology for abalone farming.
					 This technology is based on the method of water circulation and ultraviolet.
					
					 It helps cut down the period of spat maturation by twenty days and markedly boost the spawning rate.
					
					 The technology has been applied to the Ongjin Offshore Farm and other units, producing good results.

articles.title: 16th National Contest among Publication Distributors Held
articles.content:
16th National Contest among Publication Distributors Held
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The 16th national contest among publication distributors took place here from May 5 to 8.
					 The contest brought together over 100 officials and workers in charge of distributing publications selected from each province.
					
					 They competed in informing people of the gist of social and political books on undying feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, literary and art books and those helpful to turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery, etc. by diverse styles and methods.
					
					 The Publications Distribution Office in Central District, Pyongyang proved successful at the team contest and O Myong Hui, publications distributor at the Township Cooperative Farm in Pyoksong County, at the individual contest.

articles.title: World Historians Urge Japan to Admit Its Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
World Historians Urge Japan to Admit Its Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- 187 historians of various countries issued a joint statement demanding Japan admit its past crimes related to the sexual slavery on May 6, according to Yonhap News and MBC of south Korea.
					 Sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is one of the most acute issues of the past history, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 There are lots of data proving the Imperial Japanese Army's involvement in transfer and control over women.
					
					 What victims testified was most important evidence. This is backed by official documents and testimonies by other people. Clear is that not a few women were subject to horrible monstrosity.
					
					 Shunning pain of victims and handling the sexual slavery issue in one's own interests will make the international solution of the issue all the more difficult and put more unbearable insult on victims.
					
					 Japan's denial and negation of pain sustained by the victims can never be tolerated.
					
					 Japan should not just talk about human rights and humanitarianism but show respect for them in action and admit its sexual slavery in the past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Purpose of Trumpeting about DPRK's "Threat of Nukes and Missiles"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Japan's Purpose of Trumpeting about DPRK's "Threat of Nukes and Missiles"
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Japan is noisily trumpeting about "threat of nukes and missiles" from the DPRK. The purpose is to turn Japan into a military giant under that absurd pretext and thus realize its wild ambition for reinvading Asian countries including the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Japan's reckless moves for emerging a military giant have become the root cause of disturbing peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The DPRK is the primary target of its overseas invasion. 
					
					 It is the calculation of the Japanese reactionaries that it cannot realize its wild ambition for continental aggression unless it occupies the DPRK standing imposingly as a fortress that guarantees peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Hence, Japan is watching for a chance of reinvasion, persistently resorting to hostile moves against the DPRK, as evidenced by its ever more desperate racket against the latter. That is why Japan so frequently cites "threat of nukes and missiles" from the DPRK.
					
					 But such move only invites disaster itself.
					
					 Neither the Korean people nor Asia is what used to be in the past.
					
					 If Japan intrudes into the territory of the DPRK even a bit, its service personnel and people will give vent to their pent-up grudge against Japan and defend the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Asia.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Denounced for Concealing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Denounced for Concealing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Family Consultative Council in south Korea on May 6 denounced the puppet regime for concealing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The organization accused the authorities of finally ramming at the "state council meeting" the "proposed enforcement ordinance" which restricts the activities of the ad hoc committee for investigation into the ferry Sewol disaster and reduces the special law to a dead paper.
					
					 It noted that the regime consistently turned down the demand of the bereaved families and other people and trampled down it by violence.
					
					 Meanwhile, the ad hoc committee declared it would work out its own enforcement ordinance and conduct activities on the basis of it.

articles.title: S. Korean Human Rights Activist Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down
articles.content:
S. Korean Human Rights Activist Urges Park Geun Hye to Step down
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- Pak Rae Gun, co-chairman of the All-People Measure Council for Ferry Sewol Disaster, posted an article on the website of Chongwadae on May 5 branding the puppet chief executive as monster and beast, according to  south Korean paper Kukmin Ilbo.
					 In the article, he said that he is a human rights activist who has joined the bereaved families in the efforts to probe the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster and punish those responsible for the disaster.
					
					 He denounced the regime for seeking to obstruct the probe the truth with the "enforcement ordinance" of the special law of the ferry Sewol disaster and block the activities of the ad hoc committee for investigation. 
					
					 He said: I do not want to recognize Park Geun Hye as "president" and have not considered her as "president". Park had better step down before being dragged out by the angry people.

articles.title: German Organization Introduces Worthwhile Life of Korean Working People
articles.content:
German Organization Introduces Worthwhile Life of Korean Working People
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Worthy life in DPRK" on May 2.
					 The article noted that all working people around the world celebrated the 125th May Day. It went on:
					
					 The working masses in the DPRK including workers, farmers and intellectuals are now leading a worthy life as the masters of the country.
					
					 Mun Kang Sun, weaver of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, is deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and labor hero.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un personally visited her family and wished the newly-wed a happy future.
					
					 On the same day he visited the family where husband, wife and their daughters are all educators and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 The working people in the DPRK are leading a happy life under the socialist system centered on the popular masses where they became masters of everything and everything serves them.

articles.title: DPRK Lauded by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
DPRK Lauded by Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Country of workers" on May 2.
					The DPRK is a country in which the political freedom and rights of the working class are guaranteed legally and socially, the article said, adding:
					
					Ordinary workers are freely taking part in the state administration such as elections to the organs of state power and have the right to elect and to be elected regardless of occupation, property, education, etc.
					
					Those who are able to work can choose jobs and are provided with them by the state according to their hopes and skills under the socialist labor law.
					
					The state provides honored disabled soldiers, weak persons and welfare recipients with jobs suitable to them for the purpose of helping improve their health and standard of living.
					
					The great importance attached to the working class in the DPRK can be well illustrated by annual art performances and receptions given by the party and the state to mark May Day every year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe medalla rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe medalla rusa
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio la Medalla Conmemorativa que le otorgara el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, con motivo del 70o Aniversario de la Victoria en la Gran Guerra Patria.
					La ceremonia de otorgamiento tuvo lugar el viernes en esta capital. 
					
					Por encargo del presidente ruso, el embajador ruso en Corea, Alexandr Matsegora, traslado la medalla y el diploma al vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop.

articles.title: Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC emite advertencia especial emergente
articles.content:
Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC emite advertencia especial emergente
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos, llega al extremo en la zona candente del Mar Oeste de Corea la fiebre provocativa de los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano.
					Desde el dia primero al 7, 17 lanchas rapidas de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas cometieron la provocacion militar de entrar en dos o tres ocasiones cada dia en lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte Norte.
					
					Lo hicieron tambien 5 lanchas rapidas entre las 6 y media y las 13 y 50 del 26 de abril.
					
					El pretexto de la incursion fue "interceptar los barcos pesqueros" del tercer pais, pero la verdadera intencion estuvo en defender la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte". 
					
					La escalada de infiltracion maritima de los buques surcoreanos se ve en todas las zonas candentes del Mar Oeste de Corea, incluso la isla Paekryong, la Taechong y la Yonphyong.
					
					Ese acto ilegal, que coincide con el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC que se comete abiertamente a lo largo del frente, provoca gran indignacion de los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Con respecto a la situacion creada, la Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 8 bajo la autorizacion la siguiente advertencia especial emergente:
					
					1. A partir de este momento, en la zona candente del Mar Oeste de Corea se abrira el fuego a punteria directa sin aviso previo a los buques de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas que incursionen en la linea de demarcacion maritima de nuestra parte.
					
					Tambien tiene limite la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste del EPC. 
					
					Ya hemos anunciado varias veces que asestaremos el ataque militar de autodefensa a los provocadores que invadan, aunque 0.001mm, las aguas jurisdiccionales de nuestra parte.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste no hablan por hablar.
					
					2. En el caso de desafio al fuego a punteria directa de autodefensa de nuestra parte, se daran el segundo y el tercero o mas contraataques mas fuertes. 
					
					Nuestros sucesivos contraataques mostraran el fin tragico de los provocadores. 
					
					Esta advertencia parte de la decision rotunda de castigar implacablemente con fusiles a los provocadores enloquecidos por la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Cuando la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del frente sudoeste, mostrada hasta ahora, explote como furia de justicia y pase a la accion inmediata, toda la responsabilidad por el respecto recaera sobre las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que organizaron e instigaron la incursion maritima.

articles.title: Emitidos sellos comunes de RPDC y Tailandia
articles.content:
Emitidos sellos comunes de RPDC y Tailandia
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Reino de Tailandia emitieron respectivamente los sellos comunes dedicados al 40o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre ambos paises.
					En la parte superior de los sellos, se leen las letras en coreano e ingles "En conmemoracion del 40o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Tailandia" y estan dibujadas Accipiter gentilis (azor) y Lophura diardi, aves nacionales de la RPDC y Tailandia.
					
					Los dos paises establecieron el 8 de mayo del 64 (1975) de la Era Juche las relaciones diplomaticas a nivel de embajador.
					
					La emision de sellos comunes aportara al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia enmienda de "guia de cooperacion de defensa EE.UU.-Japon"
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia enmienda de "guia de cooperacion de defensa EE.UU.-Japon"
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El 27 de abril, Estados Unidos y los reaccionarios japoneses enmendaron nuevamente la "guia de cooperacion de defensa EE.UU.-Japon" de caracter agresivo.
					En su declaracion fechada 8, el vocero del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria revela que la modificada "guia" es un documento criminal cuyo articulo clave posibilita a las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon entrar en el suelo surcoreano, segun la estrategia norteamericana de la guerra de agresion y sin el permiso de los titeres surcoreanos, tanto en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana como en el de paz pretextando la cooperacion militar con las tropas norteamericanas y desarrollar las operaciones militares.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses abrieron asi las posibilidades de involucrarse cuandoquiera en la guerra nuclear de agresion al Norte de Corea con el vistoso pretexto de ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva" y despachar sus tropas a cualquier lugar del mundo. Como resultado, se cierne en la Peninsula Coreana el nubarron de nueva guerra nuclear y afrontan serios desafios la paz y seguridad de la region, recalca el documento y continua:
					
					La enmienda de la "guia" es un producto inevitable de la vergonzosa politica proyanqui y projaponesa de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas.
					
					Lejos de formular protestas a los crimenes del pasado de Japon, los compinches traidores de Park Geun-hye adulan a los reaccionarios japoneses quienes recrudecen abiertamente sus maniobras de reagresion militarista.
					
					Efectivamente, se muestran activistas en la formacion de la alianza militar tripartita tratando de firmar el "compromiso de compartimiento de informaciones Sur de Corea-EE.UU.-Japon".
					
					Al anunciar que tratarian por separado la historia criminal de Japon y el problema de seguridad, la camarilla de Park se muestra mas adulona prometiendo reanudar cuanto antes las conversaciones ministeriales de defensa y finanzas y organizar el "acto por el 50o aniversario de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas con Japon" para "estrechar la cooperacion" con el pais isla.
					
					La nacion coreana no podra evitar los desastres nacionales si perdona a ese "poder" vendepatria que alienta la ambicion de Japon sobre la reagresion militarista. 
					
					Hay que eliminar de raices la causa de desgracias y desastres.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte hacia Rusia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte hacia Rusia
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, y su comitiva salieron este viernes de esta capital por avion especial para asistir a los festejos del 70o aniversario de la victoria en la Gran Guerra Patria que tendran lugar en Moscu de Rusia.
					Les despidieron en el aeropuerto el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song, el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en Corea.

articles.title: Portavoz de CC de FGSC denuncia represion antietica de la banda titere surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz de CC de FGSC denuncia represion antietica de la banda titere surcoreana
Pyongyang, 8 de mayo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion de condena a la banda surcoreana que recientemente reprimio salvajemente el mitin y la manifestacion de los obreros del Sur de Corea, como sigue:
					El mundo esta muy indignado ante la atrocidad de la banda surcoreana que el primero de mayo golpeteo y detuvo a los participantes en vez de felicitarles.
					
					El CC de la FGSC denuncia severamente en nombre de todos los obreros de la parte Norte de la Republica la represion fascista de la banda surcoreana, tras calificarla de crimen antietico e imperdonable desafio a la justicia y la democracia.
					
					La banda surcoreana que convirtio toda la extension surcoreana en el infierno y el desierto carente de derechos humanos, se atreve a hablar cinicamente de "DDHH" de alguien.
					
					El mitin efectuado el Primero de Mayo es una explosion de la colera de los obreros y otros habitantes ante la politica antipopular de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					La banda surcoreana no puede detener con la coaccion ni con la represion la justa lucha de los obreros surcoreanos por el elemental derecho a vivir del ser humano.
					
					Si la banda desafia con la presion fascista a la lucha de los habitantes surcoreanos dando espalda a la opinion publica indignada y la corriente de la tendencia, no evitara la bancarrota definitiva.
					
					Todos los obreros de la parte Norte de la Republica apoyaran activamente la justa lucha de los obreros y otras capas levantados en la resistencia decisiva contra la politica antipopular y la dominacion fascista de la banda surcoreana y por la libertad democratica y el derecho a vivir.
